data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Florida, United States that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Florida, United States
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Florida, United States.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Florida to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Florida. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Mongolian, Peripheral people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Mongolian, Peripheral people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Mongolian, Peripheral people is yours.
Father, guide the church in Florida, United States to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Florida.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Florida.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.
